theme.tooltip: Select a theme of paper menu.

menu-icon.tooltip: Select an icon to show in the panel.

menu-label.tooltip: Enter custom text to show in the panel.

show-recent.tooltip: Choose whether or not to show a recent file list in the menu.

show-places.tooltip: Choose whether or not to show bookmarks and places in the menu.

enable-autoscroll.tooltip: Choose whether or not to enable smooth autoscrolling in the application list.

search-filesystem.description: Enable filesystem path entry in search box
search-filesystem.tooltip: Allows path entry in the menu search box.

activate-on-hover.description: Open the menu when I move my mouse over it
activate-on-hover.tooltip: Enable opening the menu when the mouse enters the applet.

menu-editor-button.tooltip: Press this button to customize your menu entries.

activate-on-press.description: Open the menu when I press my mouse over it
activate-on-press.tooltip: Enable opening the menu when the mouse press over the applet.

show-favorites.tooltip: Choose whether or not to show favorites in the menu.

controling-height.tooltip: Choose whether or not to controling the height of the menu.

scroll-favorites.tooltip: Choose whether or not to make the scroll of favorites visible.

scroll-categories.tooltip: Choose whether or not to make the scroll of categories visible.

scroll-applications.tooltip: Choose whether or not to make the scroll of applications visible.
